title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Pediatric Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (PARDS) Subtype Classification

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Can explain the five key laboratory test values required to identify hyperinflammatory and hypoinflammatory subtypes of PARDS
Understand the fundamental principles of machine learning models utilizing EHR data and can evaluate their clinical applicability
Can produce a report applying subtype classification models to real-world clinical scenarios through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
